channel.title: Please Help :[[[[
channel.description: OK, i learned about how to set up servers from a bakatool video but i dont remember the link, nor did i save it.I try to compile my server but it says i need jdk 5 or 6.I downloaded jdk 6 and it still gives me the same message :confused: :confused: :confused: please help, and if it has anything to do with paths, can you please be specific >.> help is praised Thanks.

item.title: Please Help :[[[[
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Okay right… Open up control panel, and you should see something called “System” Open that up…

Go to “ADVANCED” tab, and then click, Enviromental Variables.

You should see something called classpath, or CLASSPATH, rename it to “classpath” and the variable value should be… C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin
– Replace the the value with the above. ^^ –

Then you should see something called “path” or “PATH”
Again, rename to “PATH” – CASE SENSITIVE – then replace the value with…
C:Windows\System32;"C\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.6.0\bin
^^

Hit ok, then Ok again, and your done, compile\run it should work…

If not, post again, ill be happy to help

Hope this helps

– J K –

Read full topic
